av4e040.1 Team Up: Guardians of the Galaxy Themed Team
Rarity: Rare
Looking for Inventory Management? Please Login w/ "Remember Me?" option selected.
Special Powers
TEAM UP: GUARDIANS OF THE GALAXY THEMED TEAM: If Star-Lord is part of the listed themed team, he has: "When a friendly character with the Guardians of the Galaxy keyword misses with an attack, give Star-Lord a Plan token. // FREE: Remove up to 3 Plan tokens. Until your next turn, Star-Lord can use Perplex and can use it a number of times equal to the number of Plan tokens removed."

Sadly, GL_Alex, Perplex is no longer allowed to be used on damage values (2021-2023). Until that changes, the best use for the Perplex will likely be reducing the targets defense by -3.

I can imagine Star-Lord having 3 plan tokens removed and then perplexing up the damage of a ranged attack by Rocket and blasting a good size hole in a tentpole-like opponent or giving Gamora a +3 attack where she connects hard on her foe. Good times.
